original: bdud dang nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje shugs de ni ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du zhes pa yul lnga'i shes pa 'jug pa'i slad du bskul bar bya ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje shugs de ni ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du zhes pa yul lnga'i shes pa 'jug pa'i slad du bskul bar bya ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: That vajra speed which conquers demons and afflictions is to be invoked for the sake of the wheel of pristine consciousness, for the sake of engaging the consciousnesses of the five objects, which is the engaging consciousness from the consciousness of the ground of all.

original: de nas lte pa'i padma las phyi rol du 'byung pa'i srog gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams bkug nas slar yang ldog go //
analyzed: de nas lte pa'i padma las phyi rol du 'byung pa'i srog gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams bkug nas slar yang ldog go //
translated: Then, having summoned external entities with the life-force that arises externally from the navel lotus, [the wheel] returns again.

original: de'i phyir rnam par dag pas dri med 'od zer 'phro pa ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nges par lte par rdo rje lcags kyus bsnun byas shing /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par dag pas dri med 'od zer 'phro pa ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nges par lte par rdo rje lcags kyus bsnun byas shing /
translated: Therefore, the stainless light rays of purity, the lord of the wheel of pristine consciousness, is definitely struck with the vajra hook at the navel.

original: phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams rang gi rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dag gis bcings nas rang gi mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs par byas te /
analyzed: phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams rang gi rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dag gis bcings nas rang gi mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs par byas te /
translated: Having bound the twenty-four hands with one's own vajra and snake noose, one should frighten with one's own weapons.

original: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsgrub byar byas shing dngos po'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa'i 'khor lo mtha' dag bskyod par byas @50a * //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsgrub byar byas shing dngos po'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa'i 'khor lo mtha' dag bskyod par byas @50a * //
translated: Having thus made the wheel of pristine consciousness the object of attainment and having moved all the wheels of the various characteristics of entities,

original: nas slar yang rang gi gnas su 'gro'o //
analyzed: nas slar yang rang gi gnas su 'gro'o //
translated: again they go to their own places.

original: de nas gzhug pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang mig gi dbang po las skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa rmugs byed kyis byed do //
analyzed: de nas gzhug pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang mig gi dbang po las skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa rmugs byed kyis byed do //
translated: Next, the entry is the eye consciousness arisen from the all-base consciousness and the eye sense organ, which is done by the stupefier.

original: bcing ba ni lus kyi dbang po las skyes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa rings byed kyis byed do //üîΩmnyes pa ni lce'i dbang po las skyes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa khengs byed kyis byed do //

translated: The binding is the body consciousness arisen from the body sense organ, which is done by the swift one.üîΩThe pleasing is the tongue consciousness arisen from the tongue sense organ, which is done by the inflator.

original: ro mnyam par byed pa ni snga'i dbang po las skyes pa sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu stobs kyis byed do //
analyzed: ro mnyam par byed pa ni snga'i dbang po las skyes pa sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu stobs kyis byed do //
translated: The equalizing of taste is the nose consciousness arisen from the nose sense organ, which is done by the very powerful one.

original: de ltar na rnam pa lnga ni dza: yig gis dgug pa dang h'um yig gis gzhug pa dang bam yig gis bcing ba dang ho: yig gis mnyes pa dang h'i yig gis ro mnyam par byas te /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa lnga ni dza: yig gis dgug pa dang h'um yig gis gzhug pa dang bam yig gis bcing ba dang ho: yig gis mnyes pa dang h'i yig gis ro mnyam par byas te /
translated: Thus, the five aspects are summoning with the syllable jri, entering with the syllable hum, binding with the syllable bam, delighting with the syllable ho, and equalizing taste with the syllable ha.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dril bu dang rdo rje dbyug pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dril bu dang rdo rje dbyug pas so //
translated: With the vajra hook, the vajra, the vajra noose, the vajra bell, and the vajra staff.

original: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod de sngar bzhin dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ro mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod de sngar bzhin dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ro mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, having perfectly worshipped the wheel of pristine consciousness, one should meditate on the equalizing of taste with the wheel of sacred commitment, as before. This is the definitive meaning.

original: da ni skyed pa'i zhes pa sogs pas skyed pa'i rim pas gnas so sor ye shes kyi lha rnams dam tshig gi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu gcig pa nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni skyed pa'i zhes pa sogs pas skyed pa'i rim pas gnas so sor ye shes kyi lha rnams dam tshig gi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu gcig pa nyid gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚Äúand now, the generation,‚Äù he explains the generation stage, the single identity of the deities of pristine consciousness in each place together with the deities of sacred commitment.

original: 'dir skyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi skyed pa'i rim pa dag la rnam par shes pa na nam mkha' dang bcas zhes pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang lhan cig tu snying po'i padmar zhes pa bde ba chen po la me'i steng du ste zla ba dang
analyzed: 'dir skyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi skyed pa'i rim pa dag la rnam par shes pa na nam mkha' dang bcas zhes pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang lhan cig tu snying po'i padmar zhes pa bde ba chen po la me'i steng du ste zla ba dang
translated: Here, when the consciousness is generated in the generation stage of the generation yoga, ‚Äútogether with space‚Äù means together with VajradhƒÅtvƒ´≈õvarƒ´. ‚Äú In the heart lotus‚Äù means in great bliss, ‚Äúon the fire‚Äù means on the moon,

original: nyi ma dang sgra gcan nam dus me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' ro ma nyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma dang sgra gcan nam dus me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' ro ma nyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: sun, and RƒÅhu or the ma·πá·∏çala of the fire of time. The samaya being and the gnosis being become of one taste.

original: de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab ma la nag mo 'bar ma ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab ma la nag mo 'bar ma ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: Similarly, on the eastern petal, K·πõ·π£·πáƒÅnalƒÅ is of one taste with Rohi·πáƒ´.

original: mchog gi pad 'dab la ni lhor dmar mo 'bar ma dang byang du dkar mo 'bar ma dang nub tu ser mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis zhes pa ye shes kyi zhal gyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: mchog gi pad 'dab la ni lhor dmar mo 'bar ma dang byang du dkar mo 'bar ma dang nub tu ser mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis zhes pa ye shes kyi zhal gyi dbang gis so //
translated: On the supreme lotus petal, in the south, RaktƒÅnalƒÅ; in the north, ≈öyƒÅmƒÅnalƒÅ; and in the west, Pƒ´tƒÅnalƒÅ arise, ‚Äúdue to the family,‚Äù that is, due to the gnosis face.

original: de bzhin du mer du ba ma dang bden bral du smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan du mkha' snang ma dang rlung du mar me ma ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mer du ba ma dang bden bral du smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan du mkha' snang ma dang rlung du mar me ma ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: Likewise, in the southeast, smoke-woman, in the southwest, mirage-woman, in the northwest, sky-light-woman, and in the northeast, lamp-woman are of the same taste.

original: de bzhin du me'i zur du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bden bral du chos kyi gand'i dang dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dang rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ste rdo rje phreng ba dang padma'i 'dab ma dag gi bar du zur gyi cha la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du me'i zur du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bden bral du chos kyi gand'i dang dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dang rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ste rdo rje phreng ba dang padma'i 'dab ma dag gi bar du zur gyi cha la'o //
translated: Likewise, in the southeast corner, wish-fulfilling gem, in the southwest, dharma-tree, in the northwest, dharma-conch, and in the northeast, wish-fulfilling tree are in the corner parts between the vajra garland and lotus petals.

original: de @50b bzhin du shar gyi padma'i gdan gyi lte bar nyi ma la 'du byed dang sa gnyis po dam tshig sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de @50b bzhin du shar gyi padma'i gdan gyi lte bar nyi ma la 'du byed dang sa gnyis po dam tshig sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: Likewise, in the center of the eastern lotus seat, on a sun, the two, form and earth, are of the same taste as the commitment being.

original: lhor tshor ba dang chu'i khams dang byang du 'du shes dang me'i khams dang nub tu rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhor tshor ba dang chu'i khams dang byang du 'du shes dang me'i khams dang nub tu rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the south, feeling and the water element, and in the north, discrimination and the fire element, and in the west, form together with wind, are of the same taste.

original: 'dir thabs rnams gtso bo'o //
analyzed: 'dir thabs rnams gtso bo'o //
translated: Here, the methods are primary.

original: de bzhin du me'i phyogs su rlung dang gzug dag ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du me'i phyogs su rlung dang gzug dag ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, in the direction of fire, wind and form become of equal taste.üîΩIn the direction of the Lord of Wealth, the element of fire and perception, and in the direction of Indra, the element of water and feeling, and in the direction of wind, the element of earth and formative predispositions become of equal taste.

original: bden bral du me'i khams dang 'du shes dang dbang ldan du chu'i khams dang tshor ba dang rlung du sa'i khams dang 'du byed dang ro mnyam pa ste zur du lha mo rnams gtso mo'o //
analyzed: bden bral du me'i khams dang 'du shes dang dbang ldan du chu'i khams dang tshor ba dang rlung du sa'i khams dang 'du byed dang ro mnyam pa ste zur du lha mo rnams gtso mo'o //
translated: In the direction of the Lord of the Dead, the element of air and consciousness become of equal taste. In the corners, the goddesses are the principal ones.

original: de bzhin du lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro'i bum pa rnams ro mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phar ma la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro'i bum pa rnams ro mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phar ma la'o //
translated: Likewise, in the directions of the goddesses of the Buddha families, in the locations of the eight petas, the vases of the taste of nectar become of equal taste. This is the rule in the transcendent stage of the Tathagata.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma'i sher gyi padma la sna dang dri ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma'i sher gyi padma la sna dang dri ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: Then, in the transcendent stage of the Bodhisattva, on the lotus of wisdom, nose and smell become of equal taste.

original: lhor mig dang yul gzugs dang byang du lce dang ro dang chur lus kyi dbang po dang reg bya dang nam mkhar rna ba dang sgra dag ste lho yi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
analyzed: lhor mig dang yul gzugs dang byang du lce dang ro dang chur lus kyi dbang po dang reg bya dang nam mkhar rna ba dang sgra dag ste lho yi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
translated: In the south, eye and visible form, in the north, tongue and taste, in the west, body sense-faculty and tangible objects, and in the sky, ear and sound become of equal taste. To the left of the southern gate.

original: sa 'og tu ni nges par yid dang chos kyi khams su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
analyzed: sa 'og tu ni nges par yid dang chos kyi khams su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
translated: In the underworld, the mental faculty and the element of mental objects are definitely present, to the left of the eastern gate.

original: de ltar dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, first, the six methods become the deities of the mandala by the power of the Tathagata lineage.

original: phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ces pa ni chos kyi khams la sogs pa ste 'dir mer reg bya rdo rje ma dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ces pa ni chos kyi khams la sogs pa ste 'dir mer reg bya rdo rje ma dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
translated: After that, the six, beginning with wisdom, are the element of mental objects and so forth. Here, in the southeast, the tactile sense and the tactile object are Vajra Lady and the body sense faculty.

original: bden bral du ro rdo rje ma dang lce'o //
analyzed: bden bral du ro rdo rje ma dang lce'o //
translated: In the southwest, the taste sense and the taste object are Vajra Lady and the tongue sense faculty.

original: dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma dang mig go //
analyzed: dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma dang mig go //
translated: In the northwest, the visual sense and the visual object are Vajra Lady and the eye sense faculty.

original: rlung du dri rdo rje ma dang sna'o //
analyzed: rlung du dri rdo rje ma dang sna'o //
translated: In the northeast, the olfactory sense and the olfactory object are Vajra Lady and the nose sense faculty.

original: sa 'og tu sgra rdo rje ma dang rna ba ste byang gi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
analyzed: sa 'og tu sgra rdo rje ma dang rna ba ste byang gi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
translated: In the underworld, the auditory sense and the sound object are Vajra Lady and the ear sense faculty, to the left of the northern gate.

original: nam mkha' la chos kyi khams dang yid de nub kyi sgo'i g-yon du rang rang gi padma'i gdan la zla ba'i steng du ye shes sems dpa' dang ro mnyam du byed pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la chos kyi khams dang yid de nub kyi sgo'i g-yon du rang rang gi padma'i gdan la zla ba'i steng du ye shes sems dpa' dang ro mnyam du byed pa'o //
translated: In space, the element of mental objects and the mental faculty are on the left of the western gate, on their own lotus seats, on moon discs, in union with the awareness beings.

original: de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma la'o //
analyzed: de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma la'o //
translated: Thus, the twelve sense bases are the Bodhisattvas.

original: da ni khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi ro mnyam pa nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi ro mnyam pa nyid gsungs te /
translated: Now, the equality of the kings of wrathful ones is stated.

original: shar gyis gor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te /
analyzed: shar gyis gor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te /
translated: At the eastern gate is Ca·πá·∏ça, holding a sword, very powerful,

original: de'i phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o //üîΩlho'i sgor rmugs byed dang phyag rgyal ma'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o // lho'i sgor rmugs byed dang phyag rgyal ma'o //
translated: and his consort is Vemacitrinƒ´.üîΩAt the southern gate is Stambhana and his consort is Mohinƒ´.

original: byang gi sgor khengs byed dang phyag rgya rmugs byed ma'o //
analyzed: byang gi sgor khengs byed dang phyag rgya rmugs byed ma'o //
translated: At the northern gate is MƒÅna and his consort is Stambhinƒ´.

original: @51a * // nub kyi sgor rengs byed dang de'i phyag rgya mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur te sgo'i dbus na gnas pa'i padma la ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: @51a * // nub kyi sgor rengs byed dang de'i phyag rgya mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur te sgo'i dbus na gnas pa'i padma la ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: At the western gate is Va≈õa and his consort is AnantabalƒÅ. They are equal in taste on the lotus in the center of the gate.

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ro mnyam par byed pa ste skye ba can gyi lte ba'i 'khor lo dang snying ga'i padma la'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ro mnyam par byed pa ste skye ba can gyi lte ba'i 'khor lo dang snying ga'i padma la'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: They are equal in taste on the navel cakra and the heart lotus of the embodied one. This is the certainty.

original: de bzhin du khro bo'i zhar las byung ba phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo skyong ste shar du dbyug pa sngon po dang 'od zer can ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khro bo'i zhar las byung ba phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo skyong ste shar du dbyug pa sngon po dang 'od zer can ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the external door guardians of the body mandala arise from the wrathful ones, that is, blue staff and Marici are of equal taste in the east.

original: lhor 'dod pa dang tsun d'a shing rta la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lhor 'dod pa dang tsun d'a shing rta la gnas pa'o //
translated: In the south, desire and Cunda are on a chariot.

original: byang du mi g-yo ba dang khro gnyer can ma'o //
analyzed: byang du mi g-yo ba dang khro gnyer can ma'o //
translated: In the north, Acala and Bhairava are on a chariot.

original: nub tu brtson 'grus mtha' yas te ;
